name: Rad Jokes: Curtain Call
description:
In September we attended the OMSI Maker Faire as part of the PIGSquad booth. We did an impromptu game jam during this event. With a prompt of "Funny Jokes," given to us by Will Lewis, we set out to make a comedian simulator.

CONTROLS:
Mouse: Selects the punchline. (Make sure you choose the right one...)
Esc: Quits the game.

CREDITS:
Will Lewis - IDEA
Adam Pierce - JOKE COLLECTOR
Nate Lewis - PROGRAMMING && ART

Customization:
You can now add your own jokes to Rad Jokes: Curtain Call. Just add the jokes to the end of the "jokes.csv" file. See "readme.txt" for more info.

Android:
This is our first Android release and haven't had a chance to test it on a variety of devices.
